title: Close Geth but got panic: sync: WaitGroup is reused before previous Wait has returned
body:
I am running a full node. Today I just restart my geth and got this problem and my state snapshot is broken. I did not forcibly close the geth process, just use `kill geth's pid`  I post the log below

#### System information

Geth version: `1.11.6`
CL client & version: prysm@v4.0.6
OS & Version: Linux
Commit hash : (if `develop`) release version

#### Expected behaviour
Close without panic or at least the data should not broken.

#### Actual behaviour
got panic 'panic: sync: WaitGroup is reused before previous Wait has returned' 


#### Logs:
